body: That's why you should check your partner's past before you marry them and if they tell you that they don't want you to know their ugly past then you should definitely investigate it.like what happened to the husband he thought he was happy but alas! she keept sleeping with her sex friend even after marriage. I'm not saying that you shouldn't trust your partner but remember you have a right to know their past since you're both going to be together but who am I to tell you since you're all virgins probably.

Because the guy is a irresponsible bastard; he only wants some meat and none of the responsibility be mental or financial, that's why they were only sex friends, dude's an asshole and a homewrecker. 

On the other side, the girl is a fucking slut, she only wants financial stability and to be loved perhaps, and the fat guy secures that for her.

Last thing, the fat guy maybe truly loves her and wants to provide, but he is a gullible fuck and partly is to blame too bcs why the fuck would you marry a hoe in the first place and then letting a man stay with your wife for days even.

All three of them are a recipe for disaster, this is a nice circus i'll tell you that lol
Very complicated situation. My question is, if those two liked eachother so much why did she marry the fat guy and not the dude that she was sleeping with for years?
You bring wife's  sexfriend  into your house and let him stay at night  what do you think will happen That's why you should always know the past of your girl before marry her
